verses.verse: The righteous <S%H6662><s%> perishes, <S%H6><s%> and no man <S%H376><s%> lays <S%H7760><s%> it to heart; <S%H3820><s%> and merciful <S%H2617><s%> men <S%H582><s%> are taken away, <S%H622><s%> none considering <S%H995><s%> that the righteous <S%H6662><s%> is taken away <S%H622><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> the evil. <S%H7451><s%>
He enters <S%H935><s%> into peace; <S%H7965><s%> they rest <S%H5117><s%> in their beds, <S%H4904><s%> each one who walks <S%H1980><s%> in his uprightness. <S%H5228><s%>
"But draw near <S%H7126><s%> here, <S%H1121><s%> you sons of the sorceress, <S%H6049><s%> the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the adulterer <S%H5003><s%> and the prostitute. <S%H2181><s%>

Against whom do you sport <S%H6026><s%> yourselves? <S%H7337><s%> Against whom do you make a wide mouth, <S%H6310><s%> and stick out <S%H748><s%> your tongue? <S%H3956><s%> Aren't <S%H3206><s%> you children of disobedience, <S%H6588><s%> a seed <S%H2233><s%> of falsehood, <S%H8267><s%>

you who inflame <S%H2552><s%> yourselves among the oaks, <S%H410><s%> under every green <S%H7488><s%> tree; <S%H6086><s%> who kill <S%H7819><s%> the children <S%H3206><s%> in the valleys, <S%H5158><s%> under the clefts <S%H5585><s%> of the rocks? <S%H5553><s%>

Among the smooth <S%H2511><s%> stones of the valley <S%H5158><s%> is your portion; <S%H2506><s%> they, <S%H1486><s%> they are your lot; you have even poured <S%H8210><s%> a drink offering <S%H5262><s%> to them. <S%H5927><s%> You have offered an offering. <S%H4503><s%> Shall I be appeased for these things? <S%H5162><s%>

On a high <S%H5375><s%> and lofty <S%H1364><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> you have set <S%H7760><s%> your bed; <S%H4904><s%> there also you went up <S%H5927><s%> to offer <S%H2076><s%> sacrifice. <S%H2077><s%>

Behind <S%H310><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> and the posts <S%H4201><s%> you have set up <S%H7760><s%> your memorial: <S%H2146><s%> for you have uncovered <S%H1540><s%> to someone besides me, <S%H5927><s%> and have gone up; you have enlarged <S%H7337><s%> your bed, <S%H4904><s%> and made <S%H3772><s%> you a covenant with them: <S%H157><s%> you loved their bed <S%H4904><s%> where <S%H3027><s%> you saw it. <S%H2372><s%>

You went <S%H7788><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and increased <S%H7235><s%> your perfumes, <S%H7547><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> your ambassadors <S%H6735><s%> far off, <S%H7350><s%> and debased <S%H8213><s%> yourself even to Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>

You were wearied <S%H3021><s%> with the length <S%H7230><s%> of your way; <S%H1870><s%> yet you didn't <S%H559><s%> say, <S%H2976><s%> 'It is in vain.' You found <S%H4672><s%> a reviving <S%H2416><s%> of your strength; <S%H3027><s%> therefore you weren't <S%H2470><s%> faint.

"Of whom have you been afraid <S%H1672><s%> and in fear, <S%H3372><s%> that you lie, <S%H3576><s%> and have not remembered <S%H2142><s%> me, <S%H7760><s%> nor laid it to your heart? <S%H3820><s%> Haven't <S%H2814><s%> I held my peace even of long time, <S%H5769><s%> and you don't <S%H3372><s%> fear me?
I will declare <S%H5046><s%> your righteousness; <S%H6666><s%> and as for your works, <S%H4639><s%> they shall not profit you. <S%H3276><s%>

When you cry, <S%H2199><s%> let those who you have gathered deliver <S%H5337><s%> you; <S%H7307><s%> but the wind shall take <S%H3947><s%> them, <S%H1892><s%> a breath shall carry them all away: <S%H5375><s%> but he who takes <S%H3947><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in me shall possess <S%H5157><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> mountain. <S%H2022><s%>"

He will say, <S%H559><s%> "Cast up, <S%H5549><s%> cast up, <S%H5549><s%> prepare <S%H6437><s%> the way, <S%H1870><s%> take up <S%H7311><s%> the stumbling-block <S%H4383><s%> out of the way <S%H1870><s%> of my people. <S%H5971><s%>"

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the high <S%H7311><s%> and lofty One <S%H5375><s%> who inhabits <S%H7931><s%> eternity, <S%H5703><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> is Holy: <S%H6918><s%> "I dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the high <S%H4791><s%> and holy <S%H6918><s%> place, <S%H1793><s%> with him also who is of a contrite and humble <S%H8217><s%> spirit, <S%H7307><s%> to revive <S%H2421><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the humble, <S%H8217><s%> and to revive <S%H2421><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the contrite. <S%H1792><s%>

For I will not contend <S%H7378><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%> neither will I be always <S%H5331><s%> angry; <S%H7107><s%> for the spirit <S%H7307><s%> would faint <S%H5848><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H5397><s%> and the souls who I have made. <S%H6213><s%>

For the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of his covetousness <S%H1215><s%> was I angry, <S%H7107><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> him; <S%H5641><s%> I hid myself and was angry; <S%H7107><s%> and he went on <S%H3212><s%> backsliding <S%H7726><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of his heart. <S%H3820><s%>

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and will heal <S%H7495><s%> him: <S%H5148><s%> I will lead him also, <S%H7999><s%> and restore comforts <S%H5150><s%> to him and to his mourners. <S%H57><s%>

I create <S%H1254><s%> the fruit <S%H5108><s%> of the lips: <S%H8193><s%> Peace, <S%H7965><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> to him who is far off <S%H7350><s%> and to him who is near, <S%H7138><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> "and I will heal them. <S%H7495><s%>"

But the wicked <S%H7563><s%> are like the troubled <S%H1644><s%> sea; <S%H3220><s%> for it can't <S%H3201><s%> rest, <S%H8252><s%> and its waters <S%H4325><s%> cast up <S%H1644><s%> mire <S%H7516><s%> and dirt. <S%H2916><s%>
"There is no peace, <S%H7965><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> "for the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>"
